translated: This son of a great family has given rise to the mind to save and protect all sentient beings, to enable all sentient beings to be liberated from suffering, to transcend all evil destinies, to leave behind all dangers and difficulties, to break through the darkness of ignorance, to escape from the wilderness of birth and death, to stop the wheel of rebirth, to transcend the realm of Māra, to not be attached to worldly dharmas, to emerge from the mire of desire, to cut off the yoke of greed, to untie the bonds of views, to destroy the house of conceptualization, to end the path of delusion, to crush the banner of arrogance, to pull out the arrow of afflictions, to remove the cover of sleepiness, to tear apart the net of craving, to extinguish ignorance, to cross the stream of existence, to leave behind flattery and deception, to purify the defilements of the mind, to cut off deluded thoughts, to escape from birth and death.

translated: This son of a wealthy family always uses these practices to save and protect sentient beings, giving rise to the bodhi mind without ever resting, seeking the path of the Great Vehicle without ever becoming weary, drinking the water of the Dharma without ever becoming satiated, always diligently accumulating the practices that assist the path, always delighting in the pure Dharma doors, cultivating the bodhisattva practices without abandoning diligence, fulfilling all vows and skillful means, seeing good and wise advisors without ever being content, serving good and wise advisors without physical fatigue, hearing the teachings of good and wise advisors, always delighting in following them without ever contradicting them.

original: 「諸仁者！
analyzed: 「諸仁者！
translated: Good people!

original: 若有眾生能發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心，是為希有；
analyzed: 若有眾生能發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心，是為希有；
translated: If there are sentient beings who are able to give rise to the mind of supreme, perfect enlightenment, this is rare;

original: 若發心已，又能如是精進方便集諸佛法，倍為希有；
analyzed: 若發心已，又能如是精進方便集諸佛法，倍為希有；
translated: If, having given rise to the mind, they are also able to diligently and skillfully accumulate the Buddhadharma in this way, it is doubly rare;

original: 又能如是求菩薩道，又能如是淨菩薩行，又能如是事善知識，又能如是如救頭然，又能如是順知識教，又能如是堅固修行，又能如是集菩提分，又能如是不求一切名聞利養，又能如是不捨菩薩純一之心，又能如是不樂家宅、不著欲樂、不戀父母親戚知識，但樂追求菩薩伴侶，又能如是不顧身命，唯願勤修一切智道，應知展轉倍更難得。
analyzed: 又能如是求菩薩道，又能如是淨菩薩行，又能如是事善知識，又能如是如救頭然，又能如是順知識教，又能如是堅固修行，又能如是集菩提分，又能如是不求一切名聞利養，又能如是不捨菩薩純一之心，又能如是不樂家宅、不著欲樂、不戀父母親戚知識，但樂追求菩薩伴侶，又能如是不顧身命，唯願勤修一切智道，應知展轉倍更難得。
translated: Moreover, one who can seek the bodhisattva path in this way, who can purify the bodhisattva practices in this way, who can serve the kalyāṇamitras in this way, who can be like one whose head is on fire in this way, who can follow the instructions of the kalyāṇamitras in this way, who can cultivate with such firm resolve in this way, who can accumulate the factors of enlightenment in this way, who can seek all fame and gain in this way, who can not abandon the single-minded mind of the bodhisattvas in this way, who can not delight in homes, not be attached to the pleasures of desire, not yearn for parents, relatives, and friends, but only delight in pursuing companions in the bodhisattva path in this way, who can not care for body and life, only wishing to diligently cultivate the path to omniscience in this way, should know that it is increasingly difficult to attain.

original: 「諸仁者！
analyzed: 「諸仁者！
translated: Good people!

original: 餘諸菩薩經於無量百千萬億那由他劫，乃能滿足菩薩願行，乃能親近諸佛菩提；
analyzed: 餘諸菩薩經於無量百千萬億那由他劫，乃能滿足菩薩願行，乃能親近諸佛菩提；
translated: Other bodhisattvas may spend immeasurable hundreds of thousands of myriads of koṭis of nayutas of kalpas before they can fulfill the bodhisattva vows and practices, before they can draw near to the enlightenment of the buddhas;

original: 此長者子，於一生內，則能淨佛剎，則能化眾生，則能以智慧深入法界，則能成就諸波羅蜜，則能增廣一切諸行，則能圓滿一切大願，則能超出一切魔業，則能承事一切善友，則能清淨諸菩薩道，則能具足普賢諸行。
analyzed: 此長者子，於一生內，則能淨佛剎，則能化眾生，則能以智慧深入法界，則能成就諸波羅蜜，則能增廣一切諸行，則能圓滿一切大願，則能超出一切魔業，則能承事一切善友，則能清淨諸菩薩道，則能具足普賢諸行。
translated: This son of a good family, in a single lifetime, will be able to purify buddha-lands, will be able to transform beings, will be able to deeply enter the Dharma realm with wisdom, will be able to accomplish the perfections, will be able to expand all practices, will be able to fulfill all great vows, will be able to transcend all demonic activities, will be able to serve all good and wise advisors, will be able to purify the bodhisattva path, and will be able to perfect Samantabhadra's practices.

original: 」爾時，彌勒菩薩摩訶薩如是稱歎善財童子種種功德，令無量百千眾生發菩提心已，告善財言：

translated: At that time, Maitreya Bodhisattva Mahāsattva, having praised the various merits of Sudhana in this way, causing countless hundreds of thousands of beings to give rise to the mind of enlightenment, said to Sudhana:

analyzed: 汝為饒益一切世間，汝為救護一切眾生，汝為勤求一切佛法故，發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心。
translated: You have given rise to the mind of supreme perfect enlightenment for the sake of benefiting all worlds, for the sake of protecting all beings, and for the sake of diligently seeking all buddha-dharmas.

original: 「善男子！
analyzed: 「善男子！
translated: Good man!

original: 汝獲善利，汝善得人身，汝善住壽命，汝善值如來出現，汝善見文殊師利大善知識。
analyzed: 汝獲善利，汝善得人身，汝善住壽命，汝善值如來出現，汝善見文殊師利大善知識。
translated: You have gained good benefits, you have well obtained a human body, you have well lived your life, you have well encountered the Tathāgata's appearance in the world, you have well seen Mañjuśrī, the great good and virtuous friend.

analyzed: 汝身是善器，為諸善根之所潤澤。
translated: Your body is a good vessel, moistened by all wholesome roots.

translated: You are supported by pure dharmas, all your desires for understanding have already been purified, you have already been jointly protected by all Buddhas, you have already been accepted by good friends.

original: 何以故？
analyzed: 何以故？
translated: Why is this?

original: 「善男子！
analyzed: 「善男子！
translated: Good man!

analyzed: 菩提心者，猶如種子，能生一切諸佛法故；

analyzed: 菩提心者，猶如良田，能長眾生白淨法故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is like good fields, able to nurture the pure white dharmas of sentient beings;

original: 菩提心者，猶如大地，能持一切諸世間故；
analyzed: 菩提心者，猶如大地，能持一切諸世間故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is like the great earth, able to support all worlds;

original: 菩提心者，猶如淨水，能洗一切煩惱垢故；
analyzed: 菩提心者，猶如淨水，能洗一切煩惱垢故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is like pure water, able to wash away all afflictive dust;

original: 菩提心者，猶如大風，普於世間無所礙故；
analyzed: 菩提心者，猶如大風，普於世間無所礙故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is like a great wind, unobstructed in the world;

translated: The mind of enlightenment is like a raging fire, able to burn the firewood of all views;🔽The mind of enlightenment is like a pure sun, illuminating all worlds;

analyzed: 菩提心者，猶如盛月，諸白淨法悉圓滿故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is like a full moon, all pure dharmas are complete;

original: 菩提心者，猶如明燈，能放種種法光明故；
analyzed: 菩提心者，猶如明燈，能放種種法光明故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is like a bright lamp, able to emit the light of various dharmas;

analyzed: 菩提心者，猶如淨目，普見一切安危處故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is like a pure eye, seeing all safe and dangerous places;

original: 菩提心者，猶如大道，普令得入大智城故；
analyzed: 菩提心者，猶如大道，普令得入大智城故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is like a great road, causing one to enter the city of great wisdom;

original: 菩提心者，猶如正濟，令其得離諸邪法故；🔽菩提心者，猶如大車，普能運載諸菩薩故；
analyzed: 菩提心者，猶如正濟，令其得離諸邪法故； 菩提心者，猶如大車，普能運載諸菩薩故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is like a proper ford, causing one to leave all false teachings;🔽The mind of enlightenment is like a great vehicle, able to transport all bodhisattvas;

analyzed: 菩提心者，猶如門戶，開示一切菩薩行故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is like a gate, revealing all bodhisattva practices;

original: 菩提心者，猶如宮殿，安住修習三昧法故；
analyzed: 菩提心者，猶如宮殿，安住修習三昧法故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is like a palace, because one abides and cultivates the Dharma of samādhi;

original: 菩提心者，猶如園苑，於中遊戲受法樂故；🔽菩提心者，猶如舍宅，安隱一切諸眾生故；

translated: The mind of enlightenment is like a garden, because one plays and experiences the bliss of the Dharma within it;🔽The mind of enlightenment is like a house, because it provides comfort for all sentient beings;

original: 菩提心者，則為所歸，利益一切諸世間故；
analyzed: 菩提心者，則為所歸，利益一切諸世間故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is like a place of refuge, because it benefits all worldly beings;

original: 菩提心者，則為所依，諸菩薩行所依處故；🔽菩提心者，猶如慈父，訓導一切諸菩薩故；🔽菩提心者，猶如慈母，生長一切諸菩薩故；
analyzed: 菩提心者，則為所依，諸菩薩行所依處故； 菩提心者，猶如慈父，訓導一切諸菩薩故； 菩提心者，猶如慈母，生長一切諸菩薩故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is like a support, because it is the basis for the practices of all bodhisattvas;🔽The mind of enlightenment is like a kind father, because it instructs all bodhisattvas;🔽The mind of enlightenment is like a kind mother, because it gives birth to all bodhisattvas;

original: 菩提心者，猶如乳母，養育一切諸菩薩故；
analyzed: 菩提心者，猶如乳母，養育一切諸菩薩故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is like a wet-nurse, because it nourishes all bodhisattvas;

original: 菩提心者，猶如善友，成益一切諸菩薩故；
analyzed: 菩提心者，猶如善友，成益一切諸菩薩故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is like a good friend, because it benefits all bodhisattvas;

analyzed: 菩提心者，猶如君主，勝出一切二乘人故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is like a ruler, because it surpasses all the vehicles of the two vehicles;

analyzed: 菩提心者，猶如帝王，一切願中得自在故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is like a king, for one attains mastery over all vows;

analyzed: 菩提心者，猶如大海，一切功德悉入中故； 菩提心者，如須彌山，於諸眾生心平等故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is like a great ocean, for all merits enter into it;🔽The mind of enlightenment is like Mount Sumeru, for one's mind is impartial towards all sentient beings;

original: 菩提心者，如鐵圍山，攝持一切諸世間故；
analyzed: 菩提心者，如鐵圍山，攝持一切諸世間故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is like the Iron-Encircling Mountains, for it encompasses all worlds;

original: 菩提心者，猶如雪山，長養一切智慧藥故；
analyzed: 菩提心者，猶如雪山，長養一切智慧藥故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is like the Snow Mountains, for it nurtures all wisdom medicines;

original: 菩提心者，猶如香山，出生一切功德香故；
analyzed: 菩提心者，猶如香山，出生一切功德香故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is like the Fragrant Mountains, for it produces all meritorious fragrances;

original: 菩提心者，猶如虛空，諸妙功德廣無邊故；
analyzed: 菩提心者，猶如虛空，諸妙功德廣無邊故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is like space, for its wondrous merits are vast and boundless;

original: 菩提心者，猶如蓮華，不染一切世間法故；🔽菩提心者，如調慧象，其心善順不獷戾故；

translated: The mind of enlightenment is like a lotus, for it is unstained by any worldly dharmas;🔽The mind of enlightenment is like a well-trained elephant, for its mind is well-controlled and not unruly;

original: 菩提心者，如良善馬，遠離一切諸惡性故；
analyzed: 菩提心者，如良善馬，遠離一切諸惡性故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is like a good horse, for it is free from all bad temperaments;

original: 菩提心者，如調御師，守護大乘一切法故；
analyzed: 菩提心者，如調御師，守護大乘一切法故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is like a charioteer, protecting the Great Vehicle and all dharmas;

original: 菩提心者，猶如良藥，能治一切煩惱病故；
analyzed: 菩提心者，猶如良藥，能治一切煩惱病故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is like a good medicine, able to cure all afflictions;

analyzed: 菩提心者，猶如坑穽，陷沒一切諸惡法故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is like a pitfall, causing all evil dharmas to sink and disappear;

original: 菩提心者，猶如金剛，悉能穿徹一切法故；
analyzed: 菩提心者，猶如金剛，悉能穿徹一切法故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is like a vajra, able to penetrate all dharmas;

original: 菩提心者，猶如香篋，能貯一切功德香故；
analyzed: 菩提心者，猶如香篋，能貯一切功德香故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is like a fragrant chest, able to store the fragrance of all merits;

original: 菩提心者，猶如妙華，一切世間所樂見故；
analyzed: 菩提心者，猶如妙華，一切世間所樂見故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is like a wonderful flower, pleasing to all worlds to behold;

analyzed: 菩提心者，如白栴檀，除眾欲熱使清涼故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is like white sandalwood, removing the heat of desires and bringing coolness;

analyzed: 菩提心者，如黑沈香，能熏法界悉周遍故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is like black agarwood, able to pervade the Dharma realm with its fragrance;

original: 菩提心者，如善見藥王，能破一切煩惱病故；
analyzed: 菩提心者，如善見藥王，能破一切煩惱病故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is like the excellent medicine king, able to cure all afflictions;

original: 菩提心者，如毘笈摩藥，能拔一切諸惑箭故；
analyzed: 菩提心者，如毘笈摩藥，能拔一切諸惑箭故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is like the medicine vidhi, because it can pull out all the arrows of afflictions;

analyzed: 菩提心者，猶如帝釋，一切主中最為尊故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is like Śakra, because it is the most honored among all lords;

analyzed: 菩提心者，如毘沙門，能斷一切貧窮苦故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is like Vaiśravaṇa, because it can cut off all the suffering of poverty;

analyzed: 菩提心者，如功德天，一切功德所莊嚴故；

analyzed: 菩提心者，如劫燒火，能燒一切諸有為故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is like the fire at the end of the eon, because it can burn up all conditioned things;

translated: The mind of enlightenment is like the root medicine of non-arising, because it nurtures all the qualities of the buddhas;🔽The mind of enlightenment is like the dragon pearl, because it can dissolve all the poisons of afflictions;

analyzed: 菩提心者，如水清珠，能清一切煩惱濁故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is like the water-purifying pearl, because it can purify all the turbidity of afflictions;

original: 菩提心者，如如意珠，周給一切諸貧乏故；
analyzed: 菩提心者，如如意珠，周給一切諸貧乏故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is like a wish-fulfilling jewel, providing for all the poor and destitute;

original: 菩提心者，如功德瓶，滿足一切眾生心故；
analyzed: 菩提心者，如功德瓶，滿足一切眾生心故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is like a wish-fulfilling vase, fulfilling the minds of all sentient beings;

original: 菩提心者，如如意樹，能雨一切莊嚴具故；
analyzed: 菩提心者，如如意樹，能雨一切莊嚴具故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is like a wish-fulfilling tree, able to rain down all kinds of adornments;

original: 菩提心者，如鵝羽衣，不受一切生死垢故；
analyzed: 菩提心者，如鵝羽衣，不受一切生死垢故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is like a goose-feather robe, not accepting any of the defilements of birth and death;

original: 菩提心者，如白㲲線，從本已來性清淨故；
analyzed: 菩提心者，如白㲲線，從本已來性清淨故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is like a thread of white cotton, pure by nature from the very beginning;

original: 菩提心者，如快利犁，能治一切眾生田故；
analyzed: 菩提心者，如快利犁，能治一切眾生田故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is like a sharp plow, able to cultivate the fields of all sentient beings;

original: 菩提心者，如那羅延，能摧一切我見敵故；🔽菩提心者，猶如快箭，能破一切諸苦的故；🔽菩提心者，猶如利矛，能穿一切煩惱甲故；
analyzed: 菩提心者，如那羅延，能摧一切我見敵故； 菩提心者，猶如快箭，能破一切諸苦的故； 菩提心者，猶如利矛，能穿一切煩惱甲故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is like Nārāyaṇa, able to crush the enemy of the view of self;🔽The mind of enlightenment is like a swift arrow, able to pierce the target of all suffering;🔽The mind of enlightenment is like a sharp spear, able to penetrate the armor of all afflictions;

original: 菩提心者，猶如堅甲，能護一切如理心故；
analyzed: 菩提心者，猶如堅甲，能護一切如理心故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is like strong armor, able to protect the mind that accords with reality;

original: 菩提心者，猶如利刀，能斬一切煩惱首故；🔽菩提心者，猶如利劍，能斷一切憍慢鎧故；
analyzed: 菩提心者，猶如利刀，能斬一切煩惱首故； 菩提心者，猶如利劍，能斷一切憍慢鎧故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is like a sharp knife, able to cut off the heads of all afflictions;🔽The mind of enlightenment is like a sharp sword, able to cut through the armor of all arrogance;

original: 菩提心者，如勇將幢，能伏一切諸魔軍故；
analyzed: 菩提心者，如勇將幢，能伏一切諸魔軍故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is like the banner of a brave general, able to subdue all māras and armies;

original: 菩提心者，猶如利鋸，能截一切無明樹故；🔽菩提心者，猶如利斧，能伐一切諸苦樹故；
analyzed: 菩提心者，猶如利鋸，能截一切無明樹故； 菩提心者，猶如利斧，能伐一切諸苦樹故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is like a sharp saw, able to cut down the tree of ignorance;🔽The mind of enlightenment is like a sharp axe, able to fell the trees of all suffering;

original: 菩提心者，猶如兵仗，能防一切諸苦難故；🔽菩提心者，猶如善手，防護一切諸度身故；
analyzed: 菩提心者，猶如兵仗，能防一切諸苦難故； 菩提心者，猶如善手，防護一切諸度身故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is like a weapon, able to prevent all suffering and difficulties;🔽The mind of enlightenment is like a good hand, protecting the body of all perfections;

original: 菩提心者，猶如好足，安立一切諸功德故；🔽菩提心者，猶如眼藥，滅除一切無明翳故；
analyzed: 菩提心者，猶如好足，安立一切諸功德故； 菩提心者，猶如眼藥，滅除一切無明翳故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is like a good foot, establishing all merits;🔽The mind of enlightenment is like eye medicine, eliminating all the veils of ignorance;

original: 菩提心者，猶如鉗鑷，能拔一切身見刺故；
analyzed: 菩提心者，猶如鉗鑷，能拔一切身見刺故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is like a pair of tweezers, able to pull out the thorns of all views of self;

original: 菩提心者，猶如臥具，息除生死諸勞苦故；
analyzed: 菩提心者，猶如臥具，息除生死諸勞苦故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is like a bed, because it rests and relieves the hardships of birth and death;

original: 菩提心者，如善知識，能解一切生死縛故；
analyzed: 菩提心者，如善知識，能解一切生死縛故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is like a good friend, because it can untie all the bonds of birth and death;

original: 菩提心者，如好珍財，能除一切貧窮事故；
analyzed: 菩提心者，如好珍財，能除一切貧窮事故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is like fine treasures, because it can remove all poverty and hardship;

original: 菩提心者，如大導師，善知菩薩出要道故；
analyzed: 菩提心者，如大導師，善知菩薩出要道故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is like a great guide, because it well knows the path of transcendence for bodhisattvas;

original: 菩提心者，猶如伏藏，出功德財無匱乏故；
analyzed: 菩提心者，猶如伏藏，出功德財無匱乏故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is like a hidden treasure, because it produces the wealth of merit without depletion;

original: 菩提心者，猶如涌泉，生智慧水無窮盡故；
analyzed: 菩提心者，猶如涌泉，生智慧水無窮盡故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is like a spring, because it produces the water of wisdom without exhaustion;

original: 菩提心者，猶如明鏡，普現一切法門像故；
analyzed: 菩提心者，猶如明鏡，普現一切法門像故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is like a bright mirror, because it universally reflects all Dharma gates;

original: 菩提心者，猶如蓮華，不染一切諸罪垢故；🔽菩提心者，猶如大河，流引一切度攝法故；
analyzed: 菩提心者，猶如蓮華，不染一切諸罪垢故； 菩提心者，猶如大河，流引一切度攝法故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is like a lotus, because it is unstained by any faults or defilements;🔽The mind of enlightenment is like a great river, because it flows and gathers in all the dharmas of liberation;

original: 菩提心者，如大龍王，能雨一切妙法雨故；
analyzed: 菩提心者，如大龍王，能雨一切妙法雨故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is like a great dragon king, because it can rain down the wonderful Dharma rain everywhere;

original: 菩提心者，猶如命根，任持菩薩大悲身故；
analyzed: 菩提心者，猶如命根，任持菩薩大悲身故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is like a life-force, sustaining the great compassion of the bodhisattva;

original: 菩提心者，猶如甘露，能令安住不死界故；
analyzed: 菩提心者，猶如甘露，能令安住不死界故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is like nectar, enabling one to abide in the realm of immortality;

original: 菩提心者，猶如大網，普攝一切諸眾生故；
analyzed: 菩提心者，猶如大網，普攝一切諸眾生故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is like a great net, universally encompassing all sentient beings;

original: 菩提心者，猶如羂索，攝取一切所應化故；
analyzed: 菩提心者，猶如羂索，攝取一切所應化故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is like a lasso, gathering in all those to be taught;

original: 菩提心者，猶如鉤餌，出有淵中所居者故；
analyzed: 菩提心者，猶如鉤餌，出有淵中所居者故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is like a hook and bait, drawing out those dwelling in the abyss of existence;

original: 菩提心者，如阿伽陀藥，能令無病永安隱故；🔽菩提心者，如除毒藥，悉能消歇貪愛毒故；🔽菩提心者，如善持呪，能除一切顛倒毒故；
analyzed: 菩提心者，如阿伽陀藥，能令無病永安隱故； 菩提心者，如除毒藥，悉能消歇貪愛毒故； 菩提心者，如善持呪，能除一切顛倒毒故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is like the agada medicine, enabling one to be well and at ease without illness;🔽The mind of enlightenment is like a poison-removing medicine, able to completely dispel the poison of craving;🔽The mind of enlightenment is like a well-held mantra, able to eliminate all the poisons of inverted thinking;

original: 菩提心者，猶如疾風，能卷一切諸障霧故；
analyzed: 菩提心者，猶如疾風，能卷一切諸障霧故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is like a swift wind, able to sweep away all the mists of obstructions;

original: 菩提心者，如大寶洲，出生一切覺分寶故；
analyzed: 菩提心者，如大寶洲，出生一切覺分寶故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is like a great treasure island, giving birth to all the treasures of enlightenment.

original: 菩提心者，如好種性，出生一切白淨法故；
analyzed: 菩提心者，如好種性，出生一切白淨法故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is like a good seed, giving birth to all pure dharmas.

original: 菩提心者，猶如住宅，諸功德法所依處故；
analyzed: 菩提心者，猶如住宅，諸功德法所依處故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is like a dwelling, the place where all meritorious dharmas are based.

original: 菩提心者，猶如市肆，菩薩商人貿易處故；
analyzed: 菩提心者，猶如市肆，菩薩商人貿易處故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is like a marketplace, the place where bodhisattvas trade.

original: 菩提心者，如鍊金藥，能治一切煩惱垢故；
analyzed: 菩提心者，如鍊金藥，能治一切煩惱垢故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is like the elixir for refining gold, able to purify all afflictions.

original: 菩提心者，猶如好蜜，圓滿一切功德味故；
analyzed: 菩提心者，猶如好蜜，圓滿一切功德味故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is like good honey, perfectly replete with the flavors of all merits.

original: 菩提心者，猶如正道，令諸菩薩入智城故；
analyzed: 菩提心者，猶如正道，令諸菩薩入智城故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is like the right path, enabling bodhisattvas to enter the city of wisdom.

original: 菩提心者，猶如好器，能持一切白淨法故；
analyzed: 菩提心者，猶如好器，能持一切白淨法故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is like a good vessel, able to contain all pure dharmas.

original: 菩提心者，猶如時雨，能滅一切煩惱塵故；
analyzed: 菩提心者，猶如時雨，能滅一切煩惱塵故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is like timely rain, able to extinguish all afflictions and dust.

original: 菩提心者，則為住處，一切菩薩所住處故；
analyzed: 菩提心者，則為住處，一切菩薩所住處故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is a dwelling place, the place where all bodhisattvas dwell.

original: 菩提心者，則為壽行，不取聲聞解脫果故；
analyzed: 菩提心者，則為壽行，不取聲聞解脫果故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is the practice of longevity, because it does not grasp the fruit of liberation of the śrāvakas;

original: 菩提心者，如淨瑠璃，自性明潔無諸垢故；
analyzed: 菩提心者，如淨瑠璃，自性明潔無諸垢故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is like pure lapis lazuli, because its intrinsic nature is clear and pure, free from defilements;

original: 菩提心者，如帝青寶，出過世間二乘智故；
analyzed: 菩提心者，如帝青寶，出過世間二乘智故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is like an imperial blue gem, because it surpasses the wisdom of the world and the two vehicles;

original: 菩提心者，如更漏鼓，覺諸眾生煩惱睡故；
analyzed: 菩提心者，如更漏鼓，覺諸眾生煩惱睡故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is like a drum in the palace, because it awakens sentient beings from the sleep of afflictions;

original: 菩提心者，如清淨水，性本澄潔無垢濁故；
analyzed: 菩提心者，如清淨水，性本澄潔無垢濁故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is like pure water, because its nature is originally clear and clean, free from turbidity;

original: 菩提心者，如閻浮金，映奪一切有為善故；
analyzed: 菩提心者，如閻浮金，映奪一切有為善故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is like gold from the Jambū River, because it outshines all conditioned good;

original: 菩提心者，如大山王，超出一切諸世間故；
analyzed: 菩提心者，如大山王，超出一切諸世間故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is like a great mountain king, because it towers above all worlds;

original: 菩提心者，則為所歸，不拒一切諸來者故；
analyzed: 菩提心者，則為所歸，不拒一切諸來者故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is the place to which one returns, because it does not reject any who come;

original: 菩提心者，則為義利，能除一切衰惱事故；
analyzed: 菩提心者，則為義利，能除一切衰惱事故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is the benefit, because it can eliminate all misfortune and trouble;

original: 菩提心者，則為妙寶，能令一切心歡喜故；
analyzed: 菩提心者，則為妙寶，能令一切心歡喜故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is the wondrous treasure, because it can delight the minds of all;

original: 菩提心者，如大施會，充滿一切眾生心故；
analyzed: 菩提心者，如大施會，充滿一切眾生心故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is like a great giving assembly, filling the minds of all sentient beings;

original: 菩提心者，則為尊勝，諸眾生心無與等故；
analyzed: 菩提心者，則為尊勝，諸眾生心無與等故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is then the most honored, the minds of all sentient beings are unequaled;

original: 菩提心者，猶如伏藏，能攝一切諸佛法故；
analyzed: 菩提心者，猶如伏藏，能攝一切諸佛法故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is like a hidden treasure, able to gather all the teachings of the Buddhas;

original: 菩提心者，如因陀羅網，能伏煩惱阿脩羅故；
analyzed: 菩提心者，如因陀羅網，能伏煩惱阿脩羅故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is like Indra's net, able to subdue the asura of afflictions;

original: 菩提心者，如婆樓那風，能動一切所應化故；
analyzed: 菩提心者，如婆樓那風，能動一切所應化故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is like the wind of Varuṇa, able to move all those to be taught;

original: 菩提心者，如因陀羅火，能燒一切諸惑習故；
analyzed: 菩提心者，如因陀羅火，能燒一切諸惑習故；
translated: The mind of enlightenment is like the fire of Indra, able to burn all the habits of delusion;

original: 菩提心者，如佛支提，一切世間應供養故。
analyzed: 菩提心者，如佛支提，一切世間應供養故。
translated: The mind of enlightenment is like a Buddha stūpa, to be worshipped by all worlds.

original: 「善男子！
analyzed: 「善男子！
translated: Good man!

original: 菩提心者，成就如是無量功德；
analyzed: 菩提心者，成就如是無量功德；
translated: The mind of enlightenment accomplishes such immeasurable merits;

original: 舉要言之，應知悉與一切佛法諸功德等。
analyzed: 舉要言之，應知悉與一切佛法諸功德等。
translated: In brief, it should be known to be equal to all the merits of the Buddha's teachings.

original: 何以故？
analyzed: 何以故？
translated: Why is it so?

original: 因菩提心出生一切諸菩薩行，三世如來從菩提心而出生故。
analyzed: 因菩提心出生一切諸菩薩行，三世如來從菩提心而出生故。
translated: Because all the practices of the bodhisattvas arise from the mind of enlightenment, and the tathāgatas of the three times are born from the mind of enlightenment.

original: 是故，善男子！
analyzed: 是故，善男子！
translated: Therefore, good man!

original: 若有發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心者，則已出生無量功德，普能攝取一切智道。
analyzed: 若有發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心者，則已出生無量功德，普能攝取一切智道。
translated: If there are those who give rise to the mind of supreme, perfect enlightenment, then they have already given birth to immeasurable merit and are able to universally embrace the path of omniscience.

original: 「善男子！
analyzed: 「善男子！
translated: Good man!

original: 譬如有人，得無畏藥，離五恐怖。
analyzed: 譬如有人，得無畏藥，離五恐怖。
translated: It is like a person who obtains a fearlessness medicine and is free from five fears.

original: 何等為五？
analyzed: 何等為五？
translated: What are the five?

original: 所謂：
analyzed: 所謂：
translated: Namely:

original: 火不能燒，毒不能中，刀不能傷，水不能漂，煙不能熏。
analyzed: 火不能燒，毒不能中，刀不能傷，水不能漂，煙不能熏。
translated: Fire cannot burn it, poison cannot harm it, swords cannot injure it, water cannot drown it, and smoke cannot suffocate it.

original: 菩薩摩訶薩亦復如是，得一切智菩提心藥，貪火不燒，瞋毒不中，惑刀不傷，有流不漂，諸覺觀煙不能熏害。
analyzed: 菩薩摩訶薩亦復如是，得一切智菩提心藥，貪火不燒，瞋毒不中，惑刀不傷，有流不漂，諸覺觀煙不能熏害。
translated: Bodhisattva-mahāsattvas are also like this. Having obtained the medicine of the mind of enlightenment for omniscience, the fire of greed cannot burn it, the poison of anger cannot harm it, the sword of delusion cannot injure it, the current of existence cannot drown it, and the smoke of various thoughts cannot suffocate it.

original: 「善男子！
analyzed: 「善男子！
translated: Good man!

original: 譬如有人，得解脫藥，終無橫難。
analyzed: 譬如有人，得解脫藥，終無橫難。
translated: It is like a person who obtains a liberation medicine and will never encounter misfortune.

original: 菩薩摩訶薩亦復如是，得菩提心解脫智藥，永離一切生死橫難。
analyzed: 菩薩摩訶薩亦復如是，得菩提心解脫智藥，永離一切生死橫難。
translated: Bodhisattva-mahāsattvas are also like this. Having attained the medicine of liberation of the mind of enlightenment, they forever leave behind all the difficulties and dangers of birth and death.

original: 「善男子！
analyzed: 「善男子！
translated: Good sons!

original: 譬如有人，持摩訶應伽藥，毒蛇聞氣，即皆遠去。
analyzed: 譬如有人，持摩訶應伽藥，毒蛇聞氣，即皆遠去。
translated: It is like a person holding the Mahāyoga medicine. Poisonous snakes, upon smelling its scent, immediately flee far away.

original: 菩薩摩訶薩亦復如是，持菩提心大應伽藥，一切煩惱諸惡毒蛇，聞其氣者，悉皆散滅。
analyzed: 菩薩摩訶薩亦復如是，持菩提心大應伽藥，一切煩惱諸惡毒蛇，聞其氣者，悉皆散滅。

analyzed: 菩提心寶亦復如是，住於生死大海之中，菩薩摩訶薩乘大願船，深心相續，載之來入解脫城中，二乘功德無能及者。
translated: The jewel of the mind of enlightenment is also like this. Abiding in the great ocean of birth and death, the bodhisattva-mahāsattva, riding the ship of great vows, with the continuous mind of deep faith, brings it into the city of liberation, and the virtues of the two vehicles cannot compare with it.

original: 「善男子！

analyzed: 菩薩摩訶薩發菩提心淨功德寶亦復如是，住生死中，照法界空，佛智日月一切功德悉於中現。
translated: The pure merit and virtue of the bodhisattva-mahāsattva's generation of the mind of enlightenment is also like this. Abiding in saṃsāra, it illuminates the space of the Dharma realm. The sun and moon of the Buddha's wisdom and all merits are all manifested within it.

original: 「善男子！
analyzed: 「善男子！

original: 如有寶珠，名：
analyzed: 如有寶珠，名：

original: 菩薩摩訶薩發菩提心自在王寶亦復如是，一切智光所照之處，三世所有天人、二乘漏無漏善一切功德皆不能及。
analyzed: 菩薩摩訶薩發菩提心自在王寶亦復如是，一切智光所照之處，三世所有天人、二乘漏無漏善一切功德皆不能及。
translated: The Sovereign Jewel of the bodhisattva-mahāsattva's generation of the mind of enlightenment is also like this. original: 「善男子！

translated: The jewel of the bodhisattva-mahāsattva's mind of enlightenment is also like this. It is able to universally manifest all the adornments of the ocean of omniscience.

original: 菩薩摩訶薩發菩提心閻浮檀金亦復如是，除一切智心王大寶，餘無及者。

translated: The Jambūnada gold of the bodhisattva-mahāsattvas who give rise to the mind of enlightenment is also like this. Only the mind-king great treasure of omniscience can surpass it.

original: 「善男子！
analyzed: 「善男子！
translated: Good sons!

original: 譬如有人，善調龍法，於諸龍中而得自在。
analyzed: 譬如有人，善調龍法，於諸龍中而得自在。
translated: It is like a person who is skilled in taming dragons and has mastery over all dragons.

translated: The bodhisattva-mahāsattvas are also like this. They attain the method of taming dragons through the mind of enlightenment and have mastery over all the dragons of afflictions.

original: 「善男子！
analyzed: 「善男子！
translated: Good sons!

analyzed: 譬如勇士，被執鎧仗，一切怨敵無能降伏。
translated: It is like a great warrior who is equipped with armor and weapons, and all enemies are unable to subdue him.

original: 菩薩摩訶薩亦復如是，被執菩提大心鎧仗，一切業惑諸惡怨敵無能屈伏。
analyzed: 菩薩摩訶薩亦復如是，被執菩提大心鎧仗，一切業惑諸惡怨敵無能屈伏。
translated: The bodhisattva-mahāsattvas are also like this. They are equipped with the armor and weapons of the great mind of enlightenment, and all the enemies of karma, afflictions, and evil are unable to defeat them.

original: 「善男子！
analyzed: 「善男子！
translated: Good sons!

original: 譬如天上黑栴檀香，若燒一銖，其香普熏小千世界，三千世界滿中珍寶所有價直皆不能及。
analyzed: 譬如天上黑栴檀香，若燒一銖，其香普熏小千世界，三千世界滿中珍寶所有價直皆不能及。
translated: It is like the black sandalwood incense in the heavens - if one ounce is burned, its fragrance pervades the small chiliocosm, and its value cannot be matched by all the precious treasures filling the trichiliocosm.

original: 菩薩摩訶薩菩提心香亦復如是，一念功德普熏法界，聲聞、緣覺一切功德皆所不及。
analyzed: 菩薩摩訶薩菩提心香亦復如是，一念功德普熏法界，聲聞、緣覺一切功德皆所不及。
translated: The fragrance of the mind of enlightenment of the bodhisattva-mahāsattva is also like this. The merit of a single thought pervades the Dharma realm, and all the merits of śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas cannot compare to it.

original: 「善男子！
analyzed: 「善男子！
translated: Good man!

analyzed: 如白栴檀，若以塗身，悉能除滅一切熱惱，令其身心普得清涼；
translated: It is like white sandalwood - if one applies it to the body, it can completely eliminate all heat and distress, causing the body and mind to be universally cool and refreshing.

original: 菩薩摩訶薩菩提心香亦復如是，能除一切虛妄、分別、貪、恚、癡等諸惑熱惱，令其具足智慧清涼。
analyzed: 菩薩摩訶薩菩提心香亦復如是，能除一切虛妄、分別、貪、恚、癡等諸惑熱惱，令其具足智慧清涼。
translated: The fragrance of the mind of enlightenment of the bodhisattva-mahāsattva is also like this. It can eliminate all the heat and distress of afflictions such as false discrimination, greed, anger, and delusion, and cause them to be replete with the coolness of wisdom.

original: 「善男子！
analyzed: 「善男子！
translated: Good man!

analyzed: 如須彌山，若有近者，即同其色。
translated: It is like Mount Sumeru - if one approaches it, one becomes the same color as it.

analyzed: 菩薩摩訶薩菩提心山亦復如是，若有近者，悉得同其一切智色。
translated: The mountain of the bodhisattva-mahāsattva's mind of enlightenment is also like this. If there are those who approach it, they will all attain the same color of omniscience.

original: 「善男子！
analyzed: 「善男子！
translated: Good man!

analyzed: 譬如波利質多羅樹，其皮香氣，閻浮提中若婆師迦、若薝蔔迦、若蘇摩那，如是等華所有香氣皆不能及。
translated: It is like the bark of the pārijāta tree, whose fragrance is not matched by the fragrance of flowers such as the pāṭala, the jasmine, or the sumana in Jambudvīpa.

original: 菩薩摩訶薩菩提心樹亦復如是，所發大願功德之香，一切二乘無漏戒定、智慧解脫、解脫知見諸功德香悉不能及。
analyzed: 菩薩摩訶薩菩提心樹亦復如是，所發大願功德之香，一切二乘無漏戒定、智慧解脫、解脫知見諸功德香悉不能及。
translated: The pārijāta tree of the bodhisattva-mahāsattva's mind of enlightenment is also like this. The fragrance of the merit of the great vows made [by the bodhisattva] is not matched by the fragrance of the merit of the untainted precepts, concentrations, wisdom, liberation, and knowledge and insight of liberation of all the two vehicles.

original: 「善男子！
analyzed: 「善男子！

analyzed: 譬如波利質多羅樹，雖未開華，應知即是無量諸華出生之處。
translated: It is like the pārijāta tree. Although it has not yet blossomed, one should know that it is the place where innumerable flowers are born.

original: 菩薩摩訶薩菩提心樹亦復如是，雖未開發一切智華，應知即是無數天人眾菩提華所生之處。
analyzed: 菩薩摩訶薩菩提心樹亦復如是，雖未開發一切智華，應知即是無數天人眾菩提華所生之處。
translated: The bodhisattva-mahāsattva's tree of the mind of enlightenment is also like this. Although it has not yet blossomed with the wisdom of omniscience, one should know that it is the place where the flowers of enlightenment of innumerable gods and humans are born.

original: 「善男子！
analyzed: 「善男子！
translated: Good sons!

original: 譬如波利質多羅華，一日熏衣，薝蔔迦華、婆利師華、蘇摩那華雖千歲熏亦不能及。
analyzed: 譬如波利質多羅華，一日熏衣，薝蔔迦華、婆利師華、蘇摩那華雖千歲熏亦不能及。
translated: It is like the pārijāta flower, which perfumes clothes for one day. Even though jasmine flowers, pāribhadra flowers, and sumanas flowers perfume for a thousand years, they cannot compare.

original: 菩薩摩訶薩菩提心華亦復如是，一生所熏諸功德香，普徹十方一切佛所，一切二乘無漏功德百千劫熏所不能及。
analyzed: 菩薩摩訶薩菩提心華亦復如是，一生所熏諸功德香，普徹十方一切佛所，一切二乘無漏功德百千劫熏所不能及。
translated: The flower of the bodhisattva-mahāsattva's mind of enlightenment is also like this. The fragrance of merit and virtue perfumed by one lifetime pervades the ten directions and all the buddhas' places, and cannot be compared to the perfuming by the pure merit and virtue of the two vehicles for a hundred thousand eons.

original: 「善男子！
analyzed: 「善男子！
translated: Good sons!

original: 如海島中生椰子樹，根、莖、枝、葉及以華果，一切眾生恒取受用無時暫歇。
analyzed: 如海島中生椰子樹，根、莖、枝、葉及以華果，一切眾生恒取受用無時暫歇。
translated: It is like the coconut trees that grow on ocean islands. Their roots, trunks, branches, leaves, flowers, and fruits are constantly used and enjoyed by all beings without rest.

original: 菩薩摩訶薩菩提心樹亦復如是，始從發起悲願之心，乃至成佛，正法住世，常時利益一切世間無有間歇。
analyzed: 菩薩摩訶薩菩提心樹亦復如是，始從發起悲願之心，乃至成佛，正法住世，常時利益一切世間無有間歇。
translated: The Bodhisattva-mahāsattva's tree of the mind of enlightenment is also like this. From the initial arising of the compassionate vow-mind, up to the attainment of Buddhahood and the abiding of the true Dharma in the world, it always benefits all worlds without interruption.

original: 「善男子！
analyzed: 「善男子！
translated: Good man!

original: 如有藥汁，名：
analyzed: 如有藥汁，名：
translated: There is a medicinal juice called:

analyzed: 訶宅迦，人或得之，以其一兩變千兩銅，悉成真金，非千兩銅能變此藥。
translated: Hāṭakakā, if one obtains it and uses one ounce of it to transform a thousand ounces of copper, all of it becomes genuine gold, and the thousand ounces of copper cannot transform this medicine.

original: 菩薩摩訶薩亦復如是，以菩提心迴向智藥，普變一切業惑等法，悉使成於一切智相，非業惑等能變其心。
analyzed: 菩薩摩訶薩亦復如是，以菩提心迴向智藥，普變一切業惑等法，悉使成於一切智相，非業惑等能變其心。
translated: The Bodhisattva-mahāsattva is also like this. With the medicinal wisdom of the mind of enlightenment, he universally transforms all dharmas such as karma and afflictions, causing them all to become the characteristics of omniscience, and karma and afflictions cannot transform his mind.

original: 「善男子！
analyzed: 「善男子！
translated: Good man!

original: 譬如小火，隨所焚燒，其焰轉熾。
analyzed: 譬如小火，隨所焚燒，其焰轉熾。
translated: It is like a small fire that, as it burns, its flames increase.

original: 菩薩摩訶薩菩提心火亦復如是，隨所攀緣，智焰增長。
analyzed: 菩薩摩訶薩菩提心火亦復如是，隨所攀緣，智焰增長。
translated: The fire of the Bodhisattva-mahāsattva's mind of enlightenment is also like this. As it grasps its objects, the flames of wisdom increase.

original: 「善男子！
analyzed: 「善男子！
translated: Good man!

original: 譬如一燈，然百千燈，其本一燈無減無盡。
analyzed: 譬如一燈，然百千燈，其本一燈無減無盡。
translated: It is like a single lamp that can light a hundred thousand lamps, yet the original lamp neither diminishes nor is exhausted.

original: 菩薩摩訶薩菩提心燈亦復如是，普然三世諸佛智燈，而其心燈無減無盡。
analyzed: 菩薩摩訶薩菩提心燈亦復如是，普然三世諸佛智燈，而其心燈無減無盡。
translated: The lamp of the mind of enlightenment of the bodhisattva-mahāsattvas is also like this. It can light the lamps of wisdom of the buddhas of the three times, yet that lamp of the mind is neither diminished nor exhausted.

original: 「善男子！
analyzed: 「善男子！
translated: Good sons!

original: 譬如一燈，入於闇室，百千年闇悉能破盡。
analyzed: 譬如一燈，入於闇室，百千年闇悉能破盡。
translated: It is like a single lamp that can enter a dark room and completely dispel a hundred thousand years of darkness.

original: 菩薩摩訶薩菩提心燈亦復如是，入於眾生心室之內，百千萬億不可說劫諸業煩惱、種種闇障悉能除盡。
analyzed: 菩薩摩訶薩菩提心燈亦復如是，入於眾生心室之內，百千萬億不可說劫諸業煩惱、種種闇障悉能除盡。
translated: The lamp of the mind of enlightenment of the bodhisattva-mahāsattvas is also like this. It can enter the inner room of the minds of sentient beings and completely eliminate a hundred thousand koṭīs of inexpressibly many eons of karmic afflictions and various kinds of darkness and obstructions.

original: 「善男子！
analyzed: 「善男子！
translated: Good sons!

original: 譬如燈炷，隨其大小而發光明；
analyzed: 譬如燈炷，隨其大小而發光明；
translated: It is like a lamp wick that emits light according to its size;

original: 若益膏油，明終不絕。
analyzed: 若益膏油，明終不絕。
translated: if more oil is added, the light will never be extinguished.

original: 菩薩摩訶薩菩提心燈亦復如是，大願為炷，光照法界；
analyzed: 菩薩摩訶薩菩提心燈亦復如是，大願為炷，光照法界；
translated: The lamp of the mind of enlightenment of the bodhisattva-mahāsattvas is also like this. Great vows are like the wick, and the light illuminates the Dharma realm;

original: 益大悲油，教化眾生，莊嚴國土，施作佛事，無有休息。
analyzed: 益大悲油，教化眾生，莊嚴國土，施作佛事，無有休息。
translated: Increasing the oil of great compassion, teaching and transforming sentient beings, adorning the buddha-lands, performing buddha-works, without rest.

original: 「善男子！
analyzed: 「善男子！
translated: Good sons!

original: 譬如他化自在天王，冠閻浮檀真金天冠，欲界天子諸莊嚴具皆不能及。
analyzed: 譬如他化自在天王，冠閻浮檀真金天冠，欲界天子諸莊嚴具皆不能及。
translated: It is like the king of the freely partaking heaven, wearing a heavenly crown of Jambū River gold, which cannot be surpassed by the adornments of the desire realm gods.

original: 菩薩摩訶薩亦復如是，冠菩提心大願天冠，一切凡夫、二乘功德皆不能及。
analyzed: 菩薩摩訶薩亦復如是，冠菩提心大願天冠，一切凡夫、二乘功德皆不能及。
translated: Bodhisattva-mahāsattvas are also like this. Wearing the heavenly crown of the great vow of the mind of enlightenment, all the merits of ordinary beings and the two vehicles cannot compare.

original: 「善男子！
analyzed: 「善男子！
translated: Good sons!

original: 如師子王哮吼之時，師子兒聞皆增勇健，餘獸聞之即皆竄伏。
analyzed: 如師子王哮吼之時，師子兒聞皆增勇健，餘獸聞之即皆竄伏。
translated: When the king of lions roars, when the lion cubs hear it, they all increase in courage and strength, but when other beasts hear it, they all hide.

original: 佛師子王菩提心吼應知亦爾，諸菩薩聞增長功德，有所得者聞皆退散。
analyzed: 佛師子王菩提心吼應知亦爾，諸菩薩聞增長功德，有所得者聞皆退散。
translated: The roar of the mind of enlightenment of the lion king of the Buddha should be known as also being like this. When the bodhisattvas hear it, they increase in merit, but those who have attained something hear it and all retreat and scatter.

original: 「善男子！
analyzed: 「善男子！
translated: Good sons!

original: 譬如有人，以師子筋而為樂絃；
analyzed: 譬如有人，以師子筋而為樂絃；
translated: It is like a person using lion sinew for the strings of a musical instrument;

original: 其音既奏，餘絃悉絕。
analyzed: 其音既奏，餘絃悉絕。
translated: When the sound is played, all other strings are broken.

original: 菩薩摩訶薩亦復如是，以如來師子波羅蜜身菩提心筋為法樂絃；
analyzed: 菩薩摩訶薩亦復如是，以如來師子波羅蜜身菩提心筋為法樂絃；
translated: Bodhisattva-mahāsattvas are also like this. The sinew of the Tathāgata's lion-like pāramitā body is the string of the mind of enlightenment.

original: 其音既奏，一切五欲及以二乘諸功德絃悉皆斷滅。
analyzed: 其音既奏，一切五欲及以二乘諸功德絃悉皆斷滅。
translated: When the sound is played, all the strings of the five desires and the merits and virtues of the two vehicles are all severed.

original: 「善男子！
analyzed: 「善男子！
translated: Good man!

original: 譬如有人，以牛羊等種種諸乳，假使積集盈於大海，以師子乳一滴投中，悉令變壞，直過無礙。
analyzed: 譬如有人，以牛羊等種種諸乳，假使積集盈於大海，以師子乳一滴投中，悉令變壞，直過無礙。
translated: It is like a person who, with various milks such as cow, sheep, and so forth, even if accumulated to fill the great ocean, if a drop of lion's milk is added to it, it will all be destroyed and pass straight through without obstruction.

original: 菩薩摩訶薩亦復如是，以如來師子菩提心乳，著無量劫業煩惱乳大海之中，悉令壞滅，直過無礙，終不住於二乘解脫。
analyzed: 菩薩摩訶薩亦復如是，以如來師子菩提心乳，著無量劫業煩惱乳大海之中，悉令壞滅，直過無礙，終不住於二乘解脫。
translated: Bodhisattva-mahāsattvas are also like this. With the milk of the Tathāgata's lion-like mind of enlightenment, if placed in the great ocean of karma and afflictions accumulated over immeasurable eons, it will all be destroyed and pass straight through without obstruction, never abiding in the liberation of the two vehicles.

original: 「善男子！
analyzed: 「善男子！
translated: Good man!

original: 譬如迦陵頻伽鳥，在卵㲉中有大勢力，一切諸鳥所不能及。
analyzed: 譬如迦陵頻伽鳥，在卵㲉中有大勢力，一切諸鳥所不能及。
translated: It is like the kalaviṅka bird. While still in the egg, it has great power that cannot be matched by any other bird.

original: 菩薩摩訶薩亦復如是，於生死㲉發菩提心，所有大悲功德勢力，聲聞、緣覺無能及者。
analyzed: 菩薩摩訶薩亦復如是，於生死㲉發菩提心，所有大悲功德勢力，聲聞、緣覺無能及者。
translated: Bodhisattva-mahāsattvas are also like this. They give rise to the mind of enlightenment within the womb of birth and death. The power of their great compassion and merit is such that śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas cannot match it.

original: 「善男子！
analyzed: 「善男子！
translated: Good sons!

original: 如金翅鳥王子，初始生時，目則明利，飛則勁捷，一切諸鳥雖久成長無能及者。
analyzed: 如金翅鳥王子，初始生時，目則明利，飛則勁捷，一切諸鳥雖久成長無能及者。
translated: It is like the prince of the garuḍa birds. As soon as he is born, his eyes are clear and sharp, and his flying is swift and agile. No other birds, no matter how long they have grown and matured, can match him.

original: 菩薩摩訶薩亦復如是，發菩提心，為佛王子，智慧清淨，大悲勇猛，一切二乘雖百千劫久修道行所不能及。
analyzed: 菩薩摩訶薩亦復如是，發菩提心，為佛王子，智慧清淨，大悲勇猛，一切二乘雖百千劫久修道行所不能及。
translated: Bodhisattva-mahāsattvas are also like this. They give rise to the mind of enlightenment and become the prince of the buddhas. Their wisdom is pure, and their great compassion is courageous. No śrāvakas or pratyekabuddhas, even if they have cultivated the path for hundreds of thousands of eons, can match them.

original: 「善男子！
analyzed: 「善男子！
translated: Good sons!

original: 如有壯夫，手執利矛，刺堅密甲，直過無礙。
analyzed: 如有壯夫，手執利矛，刺堅密甲，直過無礙。
translated: It is like a strong man who, wielding a sharp spear, pierces through solid armor without obstruction.

original: 菩薩摩訶薩亦復如是，執菩提心銛利快矛，刺諸邪見隨眠密甲，悉能穿徹無有障礙。
analyzed: 菩薩摩訶薩亦復如是，執菩提心銛利快矛，刺諸邪見隨眠密甲，悉能穿徹無有障礙。
translated: Bodhisattva-mahāsattvas are also like this. They wield the sharp and keen spear of the mind of enlightenment and pierce through the solid armor of the latent tendencies of wrong views, all without obstruction.

original: 「善男子！
analyzed: 「善男子！
translated: Good sons!

original: 譬如摩訶那伽大力勇士，若奮威怒，於其額上必生瘡疱；
analyzed: 譬如摩訶那伽大力勇士，若奮威怒，於其額上必生瘡疱；
translated: It is like a powerful warrior, a Mahānāga, who, if he displays his ferocity and anger, will certainly develop a boil on his forehead;

original: 瘡若未合，閻浮提中一切人民無能制伏。
analyzed: 瘡若未合，閻浮提中一切人民無能制伏。
translated: as long as the boil has not healed, no one in Jambudvīpa can subdue him.

original: 菩薩摩訶薩亦復如是，若起大悲，必定發於菩提之心；
analyzed: 菩薩摩訶薩亦復如是，若起大悲，必定發於菩提之心；
translated: Bodhisattva-mahāsattvas are also like this. If they arouse great compassion, they will definitely give rise to the mind of enlightenment;

original: 心未捨來，一切世間魔及魔民不能為害。
analyzed: 心未捨來，一切世間魔及魔民不能為害。
translated: as long as the mind has not been abandoned, all the māras and their minions in the world cannot harm them.

original: 「善男子！
analyzed: 「善男子！
translated: Good sons!

original: 譬如射師有諸弟子，雖未慣習其師技藝，然其智慧、方便、善巧，餘一切人所不能及。
analyzed: 譬如射師有諸弟子，雖未慣習其師技藝，然其智慧、方便、善巧，餘一切人所不能及。
translated: It is like a master archer and his disciples, although they have not yet practiced their teacher's archery skills, their wisdom, skillful means, and cleverness are beyond the reach of all other people.

original: 菩薩摩訶薩初始發心亦復如是，雖未慣習一切智行，然其所有願、智、解、欲，一切世間凡夫、二乘悉不能及。
analyzed: 菩薩摩訶薩初始發心亦復如是，雖未慣習一切智行，然其所有願、智、解、欲，一切世間凡夫、二乘悉不能及。
translated: Bodhisattva-mahāsattvas who have just given rise to the mind of enlightenment are also like this. Although they have not yet practiced the activities of omniscience, their vows, wisdom, understanding, and desires are beyond the reach of all worldly ordinary beings and the two vehicles.

original: 「善男子！
analyzed: 「善男子！
translated: Good sons!

original: 如人學射，先安其足，後習其法。
analyzed: 如人學射，先安其足，後習其法。
translated: It is like a person learning archery, first stabilizing their feet, then practicing the method.

original: 菩薩摩訶薩亦復如是，欲學如來一切智道，先當安住菩提之心，然後修行一切佛法。
analyzed: 菩薩摩訶薩亦復如是，欲學如來一切智道，先當安住菩提之心，然後修行一切佛法。
translated: Bodhisattva-mahāsattvas are also like this. If they wish to learn the path of omniscience of the Tathāgata, they should first firmly establish the bodhi mind, and then practice all the Buddha's teachings.

original: 「善男子！
analyzed: 「善男子！
translated: Good man!

original: 譬如幻師，將作幻事，先當起意憶持幻法，然後所作悉得成就。
analyzed: 譬如幻師，將作幻事，先當起意憶持幻法，然後所作悉得成就。
translated: It is like a magician, about to perform an illusion, first giving rise to the intention to remember the illusory methods, and then what is done is all accomplished.

original: 菩薩摩訶薩亦復如是，將起一切諸佛菩薩神通幻事，先當起意發菩提心，然後一切悉得成就。
analyzed: 菩薩摩訶薩亦復如是，將起一切諸佛菩薩神通幻事，先當起意發菩提心，然後一切悉得成就。
translated: Bodhisattva-mahāsattvas are also like this. If they are about to perform the illusory activities of all Buddhas and bodhisattvas, they should first give rise to the intention to give rise to the bodhi mind, and then all will be accomplished.

original: 「善男子！
analyzed: 「善男子！
translated: Good man!

original: 譬如幻術，無色現色。
analyzed: 譬如幻術，無色現色。
translated: It is like an illusion, manifesting form without substance.

original: 菩薩摩訶薩菩提心相亦復如是，雖無有色，不可覩見，然能普於十方法界示現種種功德莊嚴。
analyzed: 菩薩摩訶薩菩提心相亦復如是，雖無有色，不可覩見，然能普於十方法界示現種種功德莊嚴。
translated: The characteristics of the bodhi mind of bodhisattva-mahāsattvas are also like this. Although it has no form and cannot be seen, it can universally manifest various meritorious adornments in the dharma realm of the ten directions.

original: 「善男子！
analyzed: 「善男子！
translated: Good man!

original: 譬如貓貍，纔見於鼠，鼠即入穴不敢復出。
analyzed: 譬如貓貍，纔見於鼠，鼠即入穴不敢復出。
translated: It is like a cat, as soon as it sees a rat, the rat immediately scurries into its hole and does not dare come out again.

original: 菩薩摩訶薩發菩提心亦復如是，暫以慧眼觀諸惑業，皆即竄匿不復出生。
analyzed: 菩薩摩訶薩發菩提心亦復如是，暫以慧眼觀諸惑業，皆即竄匿不復出生。
translated: The bodhisattva-mahāsattva's giving rise to the mind of enlightenment is also like this. If one briefly observes all afflictions and karma with the eye of wisdom, they will immediately hide and will not dare to appear again.

original: 「善男子！
analyzed: 「善男子！
translated: Good sons!

original: 譬如有人，著閻浮金莊嚴之具，映蔽一切皆如聚墨。
analyzed: 譬如有人，著閻浮金莊嚴之具，映蔽一切皆如聚墨。
translated: It is like a person wearing ornaments made of Jambūnada gold, outshining everything else, as if they were heaps of ink.

original: 菩薩摩訶薩亦復如是，著菩提心莊嚴之具，映蔽一切凡夫二乘功德莊嚴悉無光色。
analyzed: 菩薩摩訶薩亦復如是，著菩提心莊嚴之具，映蔽一切凡夫二乘功德莊嚴悉無光色。
translated: The bodhisattva-mahāsattva is also like this. Wearing the ornaments of the mind of enlightenment, he outshines all the adornments of the merit and virtue of ordinary beings and the two vehicles, leaving them without any luster.

original: 「善男子！
analyzed: 「善男子！
translated: Good sons!

original: 如好磁石，少分之力，即能吸壞諸鐵鉤鎖。
analyzed: 如好磁石，少分之力，即能吸壞諸鐵鉤鎖。
translated: It is like a fine magnet, with a small amount of power, it can immediately attract and destroy all iron hooks and chains.

original: 菩薩摩訶薩發菩提心亦復如是，若起一念，悉能壞滅一切見欲無明鉤鎖。
analyzed: 菩薩摩訶薩發菩提心亦復如是，若起一念，悉能壞滅一切見欲無明鉤鎖。
translated: The bodhisattva-mahāsattva's giving rise to the mind of enlightenment is also like this. If one gives rise to a single thought, it can completely destroy all views, desires, and the hooks and chains of ignorance.

original: 「善男子！
analyzed: 「善男子！
translated: Good sons!

original: 如有磁石，鐵若見之，即皆散去，無留住者。
analyzed: 如有磁石，鐵若見之，即皆散去，無留住者。
translated: It is like a magnet, where if iron sees it, it will immediately scatter and none will remain.

original: 菩薩摩訶薩發菩提心亦復如是，諸業煩惱、二乘解脫，若暫見之，即皆散滅，亦無住者。
analyzed: 菩薩摩訶薩發菩提心亦復如是，諸業煩惱、二乘解脫，若暫見之，即皆散滅，亦無住者。
translated: The bodhisattva-mahāsattva's giving rise to the mind of enlightenment is also like this. If karma, afflictions, and the liberation of the two vehicles temporarily see it, they will all be scattered and none will remain.

original: 「善男子！
analyzed: 「善男子！
translated: Good sons!

original: 譬如有人，善入大海，一切水族無能為害；
analyzed: 譬如有人，善入大海，一切水族無能為害；
translated: It is like a person who is well-versed in the great ocean, and all the water creatures are unable to harm them;

original: 假使入於摩竭魚口，亦不為彼之所吞噬。
analyzed: 假使入於摩竭魚口，亦不為彼之所吞噬。
translated: Even if they enter the mouth of a makara fish, they will not be devoured by it.

original: 菩薩摩訶薩亦復如是，發菩提心入生死海，諸業煩惱不能為害；
analyzed: 菩薩摩訶薩亦復如是，發菩提心入生死海，諸業煩惱不能為害；
translated: The bodhisattva-mahāsattva is also like this. Giving rise to the mind of enlightenment and entering the ocean of birth and death, the karmas and afflictions are unable to harm them;

original: 假使入於聲聞、緣覺實際法中，亦不為其之所留難。
analyzed: 假使入於聲聞、緣覺實際法中，亦不為其之所留難。
translated: Even if they enter the ultimate Dharma of the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas, they will not be hindered by it.

original: 「善男子！
analyzed: 「善男子！
translated: Good sons!

original: 譬如有人，飲甘露漿，一切諸物不能為害。
analyzed: 譬如有人，飲甘露漿，一切諸物不能為害。
translated: It is like a person who drinks the nectar of immortality, and all things are unable to harm them.

original: 菩薩摩訶薩亦復如是，飲菩提心甘露法漿，不墮聲聞、辟支佛地，以具廣大悲願力故。
analyzed: 菩薩摩訶薩亦復如是，飲菩提心甘露法漿，不墮聲聞、辟支佛地，以具廣大悲願力故。
translated: Bodhisattva-mahāsattvas are also like this. Drinking the sweet dew of the Dharma of the mind of enlightenment, they do not fall into the stages of śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas, because they are endowed with the power of vast compassion and vows.

original: 「善男子！
analyzed: 「善男子！
translated: Good man!

original: 譬如有人，得安繕那藥以塗其目，雖行人間，人所不見。
analyzed: 譬如有人，得安繕那藥以塗其目，雖行人間，人所不見。
translated: It is like a person who obtains the medicine of safety and security and applies it to their eyes. Although they walk among people, people cannot see them.

original: 菩薩摩訶薩亦復如是，得菩提心安繕那藥，能以方便入魔境界，一切眾魔所不能見。
analyzed: 菩薩摩訶薩亦復如是，得菩提心安繕那藥，能以方便入魔境界，一切眾魔所不能見。
translated: Bodhisattva-mahāsattvas are also like this. Obtaining the medicine of safety and security of the mind of enlightenment, they are able to enter the realm of Māra with skillful means, and all the māras are unable to see them.

original: 「善男子！
analyzed: 「善男子！
translated: Good man!

original: 譬如有人，依附於王，不畏餘人。
analyzed: 譬如有人，依附於王，不畏餘人。
translated: It is like a person who relies on the king and is not afraid of others.

original: 菩薩摩訶薩亦復如是，依菩提心大勢力王，不畏障、蓋、惡道之難。
analyzed: 菩薩摩訶薩亦復如是，依菩提心大勢力王，不畏障、蓋、惡道之難。
translated: Bodhisattva-mahāsattvas are also like this. Relying on the king of the great power of the mind of enlightenment, they are not afraid of the difficulties of obstacles, coverings, and evil paths.

original: 「善男子！
analyzed: 「善男子！
translated: Good man!

original: 譬如有人，住於水中，不畏火焚。
analyzed: 譬如有人，住於水中，不畏火焚。
translated: It is like a person who dwells in water and is not afraid of being burned by fire.

original: 菩薩摩訶薩亦復如是，住菩提心善根水中，不畏二乘解脫智火。
analyzed: 菩薩摩訶薩亦復如是，住菩提心善根水中，不畏二乘解脫智火。
translated: Bodhisattva-mahāsattvas are also like this. Abiding in the waters of the roots of goodness of the mind of enlightenment, they are not afraid of the wisdom fire of the liberation of the two vehicles.

original: 「善男子！
analyzed: 「善男子！
translated: Good man!

original: 譬如有人，依倚猛將，即不怖畏一切怨敵。
analyzed: 譬如有人，依倚猛將，即不怖畏一切怨敵。
translated: It is like a person who relies on a brave general and is not afraid of any enemy.

original: 菩薩摩訶薩亦復如是，依菩提心勇猛大將，不畏一切惡行怨敵。
analyzed: 菩薩摩訶薩亦復如是，依菩提心勇猛大將，不畏一切惡行怨敵。
translated: Bodhisattva-mahāsattvas are also like this. Relying on the brave general of the mind of enlightenment, they are not afraid of any enemy of evil conduct.

original: 「善男子！
analyzed: 「善男子！
translated: Good man!

original: 如釋天王，執金剛杵，摧伏一切阿脩羅眾。
analyzed: 如釋天王，執金剛杵，摧伏一切阿脩羅眾。
translated: It is like Śakra Devānām-Indra, who holds a vajra scepter and subdues all the asura hordes.

original: 菩薩摩訶薩亦復如是，持菩提心金剛之杵，摧伏一切諸魔外道。
analyzed: 菩薩摩訶薩亦復如是，持菩提心金剛之杵，摧伏一切諸魔外道。
translated: Bodhisattva-mahāsattvas are also like this. Holding the vajra scepter of the mind of enlightenment, they subdue all māras and non-Buddhists.

original: 「善男子！
analyzed: 「善男子！
translated: Good man!

analyzed: 菩薩摩訶薩亦復如是，服菩提心延齡之藥，於無數劫修菩薩行，心無疲厭亦無染著。
translated: Bodhisattva-mahāsattvas are also like this. Taking the elixir of the mind of enlightenment, they cultivate bodhisattva practices for innumerable eons, their minds without weariness or attachment.

original: 「善男子！
analyzed: 「善男子！
translated: Good man!

original: 譬如有人，調和藥汁，必當先取好清淨水。
analyzed: 譬如有人，調和藥汁，必當先取好清淨水。
translated: It is like a person who blends medicinal juices, who must first take pure, clean water.

original: 菩薩摩訶薩亦復如是，欲修菩薩一切行願，先當發起菩提之心。
analyzed: 菩薩摩訶薩亦復如是，欲修菩薩一切行願，先當發起菩提之心。
translated: Bodhisattva-mahāsattvas are also like this. Wishing to cultivate all the practices and vows of bodhisattvas, they must first give rise to the mind of enlightenment.

original: 「善男子！
analyzed: 「善男子！
translated: Good man!

original: 如人護身，先護命根。
analyzed: 如人護身，先護命根。
translated: It is like a person who protects their body, first protecting the life-faculty.

original: 菩薩摩訶薩亦復如是，護持佛法，亦當先護菩提之心。
analyzed: 菩薩摩訶薩亦復如是，護持佛法，亦當先護菩提之心。
translated: Bodhisattva-mahāsattvas are also like this. Upholding the Buddha-Dharma, they must also first protect the mind of enlightenment.

original: 「善男子！
analyzed: 「善男子！
translated: Good man!

original: 譬如有人，命根若斷，不能利益父母、宗親。
analyzed: 譬如有人，命根若斷，不能利益父母、宗親。
translated: It is like a person whose life-faculty is severed, who cannot benefit their parents or relatives.

original: 菩薩摩訶薩亦復如是，捨菩提心，不能利益一切眾生，不能成就諸佛功德。
analyzed: 菩薩摩訶薩亦復如是，捨菩提心，不能利益一切眾生，不能成就諸佛功德。
translated: Bodhisattva-mahāsattvas are also like this. Abandoning the mind of enlightenment, they cannot benefit all beings and cannot accomplish the merits of the Buddhas.

original: 「善男子！
analyzed: 「善男子！
translated: Good sons!

original: 譬如大海，無能壞者。
analyzed: 譬如大海，無能壞者。
translated: It is like the great ocean, which nothing can destroy.

original: 菩提心海亦復如是，諸業煩惱、二乘之心所不能壞。
analyzed: 菩提心海亦復如是，諸業煩惱、二乘之心所不能壞。
translated: The ocean of the mind of enlightenment is also like this; the karma, afflictions, and the minds of the two vehicles cannot destroy it.

original: 「善男子！
analyzed: 「善男子！
translated: Good sons!

original: 譬如日光，星宿光明不能映蔽。
analyzed: 譬如日光，星宿光明不能映蔽。
translated: It is like the sunlight, which the light of the stars and constellations cannot eclipse.

original: 菩提心日亦復如是，一切二乘無漏智光所不能蔽。
analyzed: 菩提心日亦復如是，一切二乘無漏智光所不能蔽。
translated: The sun of the mind of enlightenment is also like this; the light of the wisdom of the two vehicles' outflows cannot eclipse it.

original: 「善男子！
analyzed: 「善男子！
translated: Good sons!

original: 如王子初生，即為大臣之所尊重，以種性自在故。
analyzed: 如王子初生，即為大臣之所尊重，以種性自在故。
translated: It is like a prince, as soon as he is born, who is respected by the great ministers, because of the natural sovereignty of his lineage.

original: 菩薩摩訶薩亦復如是，於佛法中發菩提心，即為耆宿久修梵行聲聞、緣覺所共尊重，以大悲自在故。
analyzed: 菩薩摩訶薩亦復如是，於佛法中發菩提心，即為耆宿久修梵行聲聞、緣覺所共尊重，以大悲自在故。
translated: Bodhisattva-mahāsattvas are also like this; in the Buddha Dharma, as soon as they give rise to the mind of enlightenment, they are respected by the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas who have long cultivated pure conduct, because of the natural sovereignty of great compassion.

original: 「善男子！
analyzed: 「善男子！
translated: Good sons!

original: 譬如王子，年雖幼稚，一切大臣皆悉敬禮。
analyzed: 譬如王子，年雖幼稚，一切大臣皆悉敬禮。
translated: It is like a prince, although young, whom all the great ministers respectfully bow to.

original: 菩薩摩訶薩亦復如是，雖初發心修菩薩行，二乘耆舊皆應敬禮。
analyzed: 菩薩摩訶薩亦復如是，雖初發心修菩薩行，二乘耆舊皆應敬禮。
translated: Bodhisattva-mahāsattvas are also like this. Although they first give rise to the mind and cultivate bodhisattva practices, those of the two vehicles who are senior should still pay respect and homage to them.

original: 「善男子！
analyzed: 「善男子！
translated: Good sons!

original: 譬如王子，雖於一切臣佐之中未得自在，已具王相，不與一切諸臣佐等，以生處尊勝故。
analyzed: 譬如王子，雖於一切臣佐之中未得自在，已具王相，不與一切諸臣佐等，以生處尊勝故。
translated: It is like a prince, although he has not yet attained sovereignty over all the ministers and aides, he is already endowed with the marks of a king, and is not the same as all the ministers and aides, because his birth is most noble and superior.

original: 菩薩摩訶薩亦復如是，雖於一切業煩惱中未得自在，然已具足菩提之相，不與一切二乘齊等，以種性第一故。
analyzed: 菩薩摩訶薩亦復如是，雖於一切業煩惱中未得自在，然已具足菩提之相，不與一切二乘齊等，以種性第一故。
translated: Bodhisattva-mahāsattvas are also like this. Although they have not yet attained sovereignty over all karma and afflictions, they are already fully endowed with the marks of enlightenment, and are not the same as all those of the two vehicles, because their spiritual lineage is foremost.

original: 「善男子！
analyzed: 「善男子！
translated: Good sons!

original: 譬如清淨摩尼妙寶，眼有翳故見為不淨。
analyzed: 譬如清淨摩尼妙寶，眼有翳故見為不淨。
translated: It is like a pure maṇi jewel. Because the eye is obstructed, it is seen as impure.

original: 菩薩摩訶薩菩提心寶亦復如是，無智不信謂為不淨。
analyzed: 菩薩摩訶薩菩提心寶亦復如是，無智不信謂為不淨。
translated: The bodhi mind jewel of bodhisattva-mahāsattvas is also like this. Those without wisdom and faith consider it to be impure.

original: 「善男子！
analyzed: 「善男子！
translated: Good sons!

original: 譬如有藥，為呪所持，若有眾生見、聞、同住，一切諸病皆得消滅。
analyzed: 譬如有藥，為呪所持，若有眾生見、聞、同住，一切諸病皆得消滅。
translated: It is like a medicine held by a spell, if there are sentient beings who see, hear, dwell together with it, all their illnesses will be cured.

original: 菩薩摩訶薩菩提心藥亦復如是，一切善根、智慧、方便、菩薩願智共所攝持，若有眾生見、聞、同住、憶念之者，諸煩惱病悉得除滅。
analyzed: 菩薩摩訶薩菩提心藥亦復如是，一切善根、智慧、方便、菩薩願智共所攝持，若有眾生見、聞、同住、憶念之者，諸煩惱病悉得除滅。
translated: The medicine of the bodhisattva-mahāsattva's mind of enlightenment is also like this. All wholesome roots, wisdom, skillful means, and the wisdom of the bodhisattva's vows together hold it. If there are sentient beings who see, hear, dwell together with it, and recollect it, all their afflictive illnesses will be cured.

original: 「善男子！
analyzed: 「善男子！
translated: Good man!

original: 譬如有人，常持甘露，其身畢竟不變不壞。
analyzed: 譬如有人，常持甘露，其身畢竟不變不壞。
translated: It is like a person who always holds nectar, their body will ultimately not change or decay.

original: 菩薩摩訶薩亦復如是，若常憶持菩提心露，令願智身畢竟不壞。
analyzed: 菩薩摩訶薩亦復如是，若常憶持菩提心露，令願智身畢竟不壞。
translated: Bodhisattva-mahāsattvas are also like this. If they always recollect the nectar of the mind of enlightenment, it will prevent the body of the wisdom of vows from ultimately being destroyed.

original: 「善男子！
analyzed: 「善男子！
translated: Good man!

original: 如機關木人，若無有楔，身即離散，不能運動。
analyzed: 如機關木人，若無有楔，身即離散，不能運動。
translated: It is like a wooden puppet in a machine. If it lacks a wedge, its body will immediately fall apart and be unable to move.

original: 菩薩摩訶薩亦復如是，無菩提心，行即分散，不能成就一切佛法。
analyzed: 菩薩摩訶薩亦復如是，無菩提心，行即分散，不能成就一切佛法。
translated: Bodhisattva-mahāsattvas are also like this. Without the mind of enlightenment, their practices will be scattered and they will be unable to accomplish all the Buddha's teachings.

original: 「善男子！
analyzed: 「善男子！
translated: Good sons!

original: 如轉輪王，有沈香寶，名曰：🔽象藏；
analyzed: 如轉輪王，有沈香寶，名曰： 象藏；
translated: It is like the precious fragrant elephant's womb incense of a wheel-turning king;

original: 若燒此香，王四種兵悉騰虛空。
analyzed: 若燒此香，王四種兵悉騰虛空。
translated: if this incense is burned, the king's four kinds of troops all soar through the sky.

original: 菩薩摩訶薩菩提心香亦復如是，若發此意，即令菩薩一切善根永出三界，行如來智無為空中。
analyzed: 菩薩摩訶薩菩提心香亦復如是，若發此意，即令菩薩一切善根永出三界，行如來智無為空中。
translated: The incense of the bodhisattva-mahāsattva's mind of enlightenment is also like this. If this thought is aroused, it causes all the bodhisattva's wholesome roots to permanently transcend the three realms and practice the Tathāgata's unimpeded wisdom in the sky of non-arising.

original: 「善男子！
analyzed: 「善男子！
translated: Good sons!

original: 譬如金剛，唯從金剛處及金處生，非餘寶處生。
analyzed: 譬如金剛，唯從金剛處及金處生，非餘寶處生。
translated: It is like a diamond, which is born only from a place of diamonds and gold, not from other precious places.

original: 菩薩摩訶薩菩提心金剛亦復如是，唯從大悲救護眾生金剛處、一切智智殊勝境界金處而生，非餘眾生善根處生。
analyzed: 菩薩摩訶薩菩提心金剛亦復如是，唯從大悲救護眾生金剛處、一切智智殊勝境界金處而生，非餘眾生善根處生。
translated: The diamond of the bodhisattva-mahāsattva's mind of enlightenment is also like this. It is born only from the place of great compassion, which rescues sentient beings with diamonds, and from the place of gold, which is the supreme realm of omniscience, not from the places of other sentient beings' wholesome roots.

original: 「善男子！
analyzed: 「善男子！
translated: Good sons!

original: 譬如有樹，名曰：
analyzed: 譬如有樹，名曰：
translated: It is like a tree

analyzed: 無根，不從根生，而枝、葉、華、果悉皆繁茂。
translated: called 'rootless,' which does not grow from a root, yet its branches, leaves, flowers, and fruits are all luxuriant.

original: 菩薩摩訶薩菩提心樹亦復如是，無根可得，而能長養一切智智神通大願；
analyzed: 菩薩摩訶薩菩提心樹亦復如是，無根可得，而能長養一切智智神通大願；
translated: The bodhisattva-mahāsattva's tree of the mind of enlightenment is also like this. No root can be found, yet it is able to nurture the supernormal knowledge and great vows of omniscience;

original: 枝、葉、華、果，扶疎蔭映，普覆世間。
analyzed: 枝、葉、華、果，扶疎蔭映，普覆世間。
translated: its branches, leaves, flowers, and fruits are luxuriant and provide shade, universally covering the world.

original: 「善男子！
analyzed: 「善男子！
translated: Good sons!

original: 譬如金剛，非劣惡器及以破器所能容持，唯除全具上妙之器。
analyzed: 譬如金剛，非劣惡器及以破器所能容持，唯除全具上妙之器。
translated: It is like a diamond, which cannot be contained in inferior vessels or broken vessels, except in a complete and excellent vessel.

original: 菩提心金剛亦復如是，非下劣眾生慳、嫉、破戒、懈怠、妄念、無智器中所能容持，亦非退失殊勝志願、散亂、惡覺眾生器中所能容持，唯除菩薩深心寶器。
analyzed: 菩提心金剛亦復如是，非下劣眾生慳、嫉、破戒、懈怠、妄念、無智器中所能容持，亦非退失殊勝志願、散亂、惡覺眾生器中所能容持，唯除菩薩深心寶器。
translated: The diamond of the mind of enlightenment is also like this. It cannot be contained in the vessels of inferior beings who are stingy, jealous, violate precepts, are lazy, have false thoughts, and lack wisdom, nor can it be contained in the vessels of beings who have lost their excellent aspirations, are distracted, and have evil thoughts, except in the precious vessels of the bodhisattvas' profound mind.

original: 「善男子！
analyzed: 「善男子！
translated: Good sons!

original: 譬如金剛，能穿眾寶。
analyzed: 譬如金剛，能穿眾寶。
translated: It is like a diamond, which can penetrate all jewels.

original: 菩提心金剛亦復如是，悉能穿徹一切法寶。
analyzed: 菩提心金剛亦復如是，悉能穿徹一切法寶。
translated: The diamond of the mind of enlightenment is also like this, able to penetrate all Dharma jewels.

original: 「善男子！
analyzed: 「善男子！
translated: Good sons!

original: 譬如金剛，能壞眾山。
analyzed: 譬如金剛，能壞眾山。
translated: It is like a diamond, which can destroy all mountains.

original: 菩提心金剛亦復如是，悉能摧壞諸邪見山。
analyzed: 菩提心金剛亦復如是，悉能摧壞諸邪見山。
translated: The diamond of the mind of enlightenment is also like this, able to crush all the mountains of wrong views.

original: 「善男子！
analyzed: 「善男子！
translated: Good sons!

original: 譬如金剛，雖破不全，一切眾寶猶不能及。
analyzed: 譬如金剛，雖破不全，一切眾寶猶不能及。
translated: It is like a diamond, even if broken and incomplete, still surpasses all other jewels.

original: 菩提心金剛亦復如是，雖復志劣，少有虧損，猶勝一切二乘功德。
analyzed: 菩提心金剛亦復如是，雖復志劣，少有虧損，猶勝一切二乘功德。
translated: The diamond of the mind of enlightenment is also like this, even if the resolve is inferior and there is some damage, it still surpasses the merits of all the two vehicles.

original: 「善男子！
analyzed: 「善男子！
translated: Good sons!

original: 譬如金剛，雖有損缺，猶能除滅一切貧窮。
analyzed: 譬如金剛，雖有損缺，猶能除滅一切貧窮。
translated: It is like a diamond, even if damaged, still able to eliminate all poverty.

original: 菩提心金剛亦復如是，雖有損缺，不進諸行，猶能捨離一切生死。
analyzed: 菩提心金剛亦復如是，雖有損缺，不進諸行，猶能捨離一切生死。
translated: The diamond of the mind of enlightenment is also like this, even if damaged and not progressing in practice, still able to abandon all birth and death.

original: 「善男子！
analyzed: 「善男子！
translated: Good sons!

original: 如小金剛，悉能破壞一切諸物。
analyzed: 如小金剛，悉能破壞一切諸物。
translated: It is like a small diamond, which can destroy all things.

original: 菩提心金剛亦復如是，入少境界，即破一切無知諸惑。
analyzed: 菩提心金剛亦復如是，入少境界，即破一切無知諸惑。
translated: The diamond of the mind of enlightenment is also like this. Entering a small realm, it can destroy all the afflictions of ignorance.

original: 「善男子！
analyzed: 「善男子！
translated: Good sons!

original: 譬如金剛，非凡人所得。
analyzed: 譬如金剛，非凡人所得。
translated: It is like a diamond, which cannot be obtained by ordinary people.

original: 菩提心金剛亦復如是，非劣意眾生之所能得。
analyzed: 菩提心金剛亦復如是，非劣意眾生之所能得。
translated: The diamond of the mind of enlightenment is also like this. It cannot be obtained by beings with inferior intentions.

original: 「善男子！
analyzed: 「善男子！
translated: Good sons!

original: 譬如金剛，不識寶人不知其能、不得其用。
analyzed: 譬如金剛，不識寶人不知其能、不得其用。
translated: It is like a diamond, which an ignorant person does not know how to use.

original: 菩提心金剛亦復如是，不知法人不了其能、不得其用。
analyzed: 菩提心金剛亦復如是，不知法人不了其能、不得其用。
translated: The diamond of the mind of enlightenment is also like this. A person who does not know the Dharma does not understand how to use it.

original: 「善男子！
analyzed: 「善男子！
translated: Good sons!

original: 譬如金剛，無能銷滅。
analyzed: 譬如金剛，無能銷滅。
translated: It is like a diamond, which cannot be destroyed.

original: 菩提心金剛亦復如是，一切諸法無能銷滅。
analyzed: 菩提心金剛亦復如是，一切諸法無能銷滅。
translated: The diamond of the mind of enlightenment is also like this. No phenomena can destroy it.

original: 「善男子！
analyzed: 「善男子！
translated: Good sons!

original: 如金剛杵，諸大力人皆不能持，唯除有大那羅延力。
analyzed: 如金剛杵，諸大力人皆不能持，唯除有大那羅延力。
translated: It is like a diamond mace, which cannot be held by anyone except someone with the great strength of Nārāyaṇa.

original: 菩提之心亦復如是，一切二乘皆不能持，唯除菩薩廣大因緣堅固善力。
analyzed: 菩提之心亦復如是，一切二乘皆不能持，唯除菩薩廣大因緣堅固善力。
translated: The mind of enlightenment is also like this. All the two vehicles are unable to uphold it, except for the bodhisattvas with vast causes and conditions and the power of firm goodness.

original: 「善男子！
analyzed: 「善男子！
translated: Good sons!

original: 譬如金剛，一切諸物無能壞者，而能普壞一切諸物，然其體性無所損減。
analyzed: 譬如金剛，一切諸物無能壞者，而能普壞一切諸物，然其體性無所損減。
translated: It is like a diamond, which nothing can destroy, yet it can universally destroy all things, and its essence is not diminished.

original: 菩提之心亦復如是，普於三世無數劫中，教化眾生，修行苦行，聲聞、緣覺所不能者咸能作之，然其畢竟無有疲厭亦無損壞。
analyzed: 菩提之心亦復如是，普於三世無數劫中，教化眾生，修行苦行，聲聞、緣覺所不能者咸能作之，然其畢竟無有疲厭亦無損壞。
translated: The mind of enlightenment is also like this. It universally teaches and transforms beings throughout the innumerable eons of the three times, practices austerities, and accomplishes what the hearers and solitary realizers are unable to do, yet it is ultimately without fatigue or harm.

original: 「善男子！
analyzed: 「善男子！
translated: Good sons!

original: 譬如金剛，餘不能持，唯金剛地之所能持。
analyzed: 譬如金剛，餘不能持，唯金剛地之所能持。
translated: It is like a diamond, which others are unable to hold, but only the diamond ground can hold it.

original: 菩提之心亦復如是，聲聞、緣覺皆不能持，唯除趣向薩婆若者。
analyzed: 菩提之心亦復如是，聲聞、緣覺皆不能持，唯除趣向薩婆若者。
translated: The mind of enlightenment is also like this. The hearers and solitary realizers are all unable to hold it, except for those who are heading towards omniscience.

original: 「善男子！
analyzed: 「善男子！
translated: Good sons!

original: 如金剛器，無有瑕缺用盛於水，永不滲漏而入於地。
analyzed: 如金剛器，無有瑕缺用盛於水，永不滲漏而入於地。
translated: Like a diamond vessel, without any cracks, used to hold water, it will never leak and enter the ground.

original: 菩提心金剛器亦復如是，盛善根水，永不滲漏，令入諸趣。
analyzed: 菩提心金剛器亦復如是，盛善根水，永不滲漏，令入諸趣。
translated: The diamond vessel of the mind of enlightenment is also like this. Holding the water of wholesome roots, it will never leak and cause one to enter the various destinies.

original: 「善男子！
analyzed: 「善男子！
translated: Good son!

original: 如金剛際，能持大地，不令墜沒。
analyzed: 如金剛際，能持大地，不令墜沒。
translated: Like the diamond boundary, it can hold up the great earth, preventing it from sinking.

original: 菩提之心亦復如是，能持菩薩一切行願，不令墜沒入於三界。
analyzed: 菩提之心亦復如是，能持菩薩一切行願，不令墜沒入於三界。
translated: The mind of enlightenment is also like this. It can hold up all the practices and vows of the bodhisattva, preventing them from sinking and entering the three realms.

original: 「善男子！
analyzed: 「善男子！
translated: Good son!

original: 譬如金剛，久處水中，不爛不濕。
analyzed: 譬如金剛，久處水中，不爛不濕。
translated: It is like a diamond, which can remain in water for a long time without rotting or becoming wet.

original: 菩提之心亦復如是，於一切劫，處在生死業惑水中，無壞無變。
analyzed: 菩提之心亦復如是，於一切劫，處在生死業惑水中，無壞無變。
translated: The mind of enlightenment is also like this. In all kalpas, it can remain in the water of birth and death, karma and afflictions, without being destroyed or changed.

original: 「善男子！
analyzed: 「善男子！
translated: Good son!

original: 譬如金剛，一切諸火不能燒然、不能令熱。
analyzed: 譬如金剛，一切諸火不能燒然、不能令熱。
translated: It is like a diamond, which cannot be burned or heated by any fire.

original: 菩提之心亦復如是，一切生死諸煩惱火不能燒然、不能令熱。
analyzed: 菩提之心亦復如是，一切生死諸煩惱火不能燒然、不能令熱。
translated: The mind of enlightenment is also like this. The fires of all birth and death and afflictions cannot burn it or make it hot.

original: 「善男子！
analyzed: 「善男子！
translated: Good sons!

original: 譬如三千世界之中金剛座上，能持諸佛坐於道場、降伏諸魔、成等正覺，非是餘座之所能持。
analyzed: 譬如三千世界之中金剛座上，能持諸佛坐於道場、降伏諸魔、成等正覺，非是餘座之所能持。
translated: It is like the vajra seat in the trichiliocosm. It can support the buddhas sitting in the place of practice, subduing the māras and attaining perfect enlightenment. It cannot be supported by any other seat.

original: 菩提心座亦復如是，能持菩薩一切願行、諸波羅蜜、諸忍、諸地、迴向、受記、修集菩提助道之法、供養諸佛、聞法受行，一切餘心所不能持。
analyzed: 菩提心座亦復如是，能持菩薩一切願行、諸波羅蜜、諸忍、諸地、迴向、受記、修集菩提助道之法、供養諸佛、聞法受行，一切餘心所不能持。
translated: The seat of the mind of enlightenment is also like this. It can support the bodhisattva's all vows, practices, perfections, forbearances, stages, dedications, predictions, cultivation of the factors of enlightenment, making offerings to the buddhas, hearing the Dharma and accepting the practice. It cannot be supported by any other mind.
